Function reference

General data import and processing

spiro()
Process raw data from metabolic carts/spiroergometric measures
add_weight()
Calculate additional variables related to body weight for cardiopulmonary exercise testing data
spiro_import()
Import raw data from spiroergometric devices
spiro_import_cortex()
Import raw data from Cortex spiroergometric devices
spiro_import_cosmed()
Import raw data from COSMED spiroergometric devices
spiro_import_vyntus()
Import raw data from Vyntus spiroergometric devices
spiro_import_zan()
Import raw data from ZAN spiroergometric devices
guess_device()
Guess the device used for a cardiopulmonary measurement
spiro_interpolate()
Interpolate spiroergometric data

Dealing with exercise protocols

add_protocol()
Add a test protocol to an exercise testing dataset
get_protocol()
Guess a test protocol from a corresponding exercise testing dataset
set_protocol() pre() wu() steps() const()
Setting an exercise testing profile
set_protocol_manual()
Manually setting a testing profile
get_testtype()
Guess the type of exercise test protocol
get_features()
Extract features from an exercise test protocol

Working with additional heart rate data

add_hr()
Import and apply heart rate data to cardiopulmonary exercise testing data

Summarizing

spiro_summary()
Stepwise summarize data from cardiopulmonary exercise testing
spiro_max()
Return maximum values from spiroergometric tests

Plotting

spiro_plot()
Plot data from cardiopulmonary exercise data files

General package functions

spiro-package
spiro: Work with data from cardiopulmonary exercise testing
spiro_example()
Get path to spiro example
knit_print(<spiro>)
Printing spiro data frames in a knitr context

On this page
